snippet: A recent conference and several studies have examined the ways people, particularly women, are gauging their success.
abstract: Alina Tugend Shortcuts column; recent conference, The Third Metric: Redefining Success Beyond Money & Power, examines ways people, particularly women, are gauging their success; several studies have examined the topic as well.
lead_paragraph: A recent conference and several studies have examined the ways people, particularly women, are gauging their success.

headline.main: A Call for a Movement to Redefine the Successful Life
headline.print_headline: A Budding Movement to Redefine the Successful Life
